title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.43 - Cost and maintenance of structures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.43 - Cost and maintenance of structures

State Regulations

Any landing, dock, float, or other structure permitted
to be erected or placed on the access area, shall be erected or placed and
constructed at the cost of the permittee, and the same shall be kept and
maintained in good condition and repair. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
606.43

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
